snippet: Representatives of the Anne Frank House said of Mr. Bieber, “We hope that his visit will inspire his fans to learn more about her life and hopefully read the diary.”
abstract: Representatives of the Anne Frank House said of Mr. Bieber, “We hope that his visit will inspire his fans to learn more about her life and hopefully read the diary.”

headline.main: Anne Frank House Says Bieber's Visit Was 'Positive'
headline.print_headline: Anne Frank House Calls Bieber’s Visit ‘Positive’
